item.title: High Quality H.264 Render in Baselight
item.description: Params Start at 39:56, Daniele introduced the method for rendering high quality H.264 in Baselight. Here is the key parameters: Rate Control: CRF based VBR Quantizer: Nominal Quantizer parameter: 18 Quantizer parameter: 18
